moves.name: Bounce
moves.effect: The user begins bouncing. After a set time, the user stops bouncing and attacks. Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target paralyzed. No other actions can be taken while bouncing. Most moves used by opponents will not hit the user while it is bouncing. If the user is attacked by a sync move while bouncing, it will stop bouncing.

moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Superior Might!
moves.effect: Charges the user’s move gauge by 3. Raises the user’s Attack, Sp. Atk, and accuracy by 1 stat rank. The user takes damage equal to 33% of its remaining HP.

passives.name: Power Flux 5
passives.description: The fuller the move gauge when moves are selected, the more this powers up moves.

passives.name: Adrenaline 1
passives.description: Reduces the sync move countdown by 1 the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.

grid.bonus: Hostile Environment 1- Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
MP Refresh 1- Has a chance (20%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
MP Refresh 1- Has a chance (20%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Dire Rain 2- Critical hits land more easily when the user’s attack move is used while the weather is rainy.
Hyper Beam:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Hyper Beam:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Hyper Beam:Paralysis Synergy 1- Powers up the user’s moves when the target is paralyzed.
Superior Might!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Terrify 1- Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user enters a battle.
Racing Rain 3- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is rainy.
Raging Rain 2- Powers up the user’s moves when the weather is rainy.
Carry On 1- Raises the user’s Attack by 1 stat rank when another Pokémon on the field of play faints.
Shower Power 5- Powers up the user’s sync move when the weather is rainy.
Refreshing Rain 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is rainy.
Pressure Cooker 9- Once per battle, reduces the user’s sync move countdown by one when in a pinch.
Sync Quickening 1- Restores 1 MP of the user’s moves with a quick move effect tag after using its sync move.
Torrential Tenacity- Prevents the user from flinching, becoming confused, or becoming trapped when the weather is rainy.
